content: the clover market bag is a wonderful crochet bag crochet pattern that you will use again and again it is worked from the bottom up and it is worked all as one piece the body of the bag is worked using a cluster stitch that is interspersed between row of single_crochet and chain stitches it makes it an easy and fun bag to work a free copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported blog https //richtexturescrochet com/clover-market-bag-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial of this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 8 stitches x 5 row of clusters = 4 inches finished size approximately 16 x 14 inches excluding the handles yarn pima cotton by lion brand® 186 yds/170 m 100g/3 5 oz 100% cotton 4 worsted weight you will need 2 balls vintage colour c 1 ball rose taupe colour b 1 ball dragonfly colour a hook size h/8 5 mm hook notions yarn needle 4-5 stitch markers
